title.desc: Specify the document title as metadata.

generator.desc: Include a "Generated by Docutils" credit and link.

noGenerator.desc: Do not include a generator credit.

date.desc: Include the date at the end of the document (UTC).

noDatestamp.desc: Do not include a datestamp of any kind.

sourceUrl.desc: Use <URL> for a source link; implies --source-link.

noSourceLink.desc: Do not include a "View document source" link.

tocEntryBacklinks.desc: Link from section headers to TOC entries.  (default)

tocTopBacklinks.desc: Link from section headers to the top of the TOC.

noTocBacklinks.desc: Disable backlinks to the table of contents.

noFootnoteBacklinks.desc: Disable backlinks from footnotes and citations.

stripComments.desc: Remove comment elements from the document tree.

leaveComments.desc: Leave comment elements in the document tree. (default)

stripElementsWithClass.desc: Remove all elements with classes="<class>" from the document tree. Warning: potentially dangerous; use with caution. (Multiple-use option.)

stripClass.desc: Remove all classes="<class>" attributes from elements in the document tree. Warning: potentially dangerous; use with caution. (Multiple-use option.)

report.desc: Report system messages at or higher than <level>: "info" or "1", "warning"/"2" (default), "error"/"3", "severe"/"4", "none"/"5"

halt.desc: Halt execution at system messages at or above <level>.  Levels as in --report.  Default: 4 (severe).

strict.desc: Halt at the slightest problem.  Same as "--halt=info".

exitStatus.desc: Enable a non-zero exit status for non-halting system messages at or above <level>.  Default: 5 (disabled).

debug.desc: Enable debug-level system messages and diagnostics.

warnings.desc: Send the output of system messages to <file>.

traceback.desc: Enable Python tracebacks when Docutils is halted.

inputEncoding.desc: Specify the encoding and optionally the error handler of input text.  Default: <locale-dependent>:strict.

inputEncodingErrorHandler.desc: Specify the error handler for undecodable characters.  Choices: "strict" (default), "ignore", and "replace".

outputEncoding.desc: Specify the text encoding and optionally the error handler for output.  Default: UTF-8:strict.

outputEncodingErrorHandler.desc: Specify error handler for unencodable output characters; "strict" (default), "ignore", "replace", "xmlcharrefreplace", "backslashreplace".

errorEncoding.desc: Specify text encoding and error handler for error output.  Default text encoding: system encoding. Default error handler: backslashreplace.

errorEncodingErrorHandler.desc: Specify the error handler for unencodable characters in error output.  Default: backslashreplace.

language.desc: Specify the language (as BCP 47 language tag).  Default: en.

config.desc: Read configuration settings from <file>, if it exists.

version.desc: Show this program's version number and exit.

help.desc: Show this help message and exit.

pepReferences.desc: Recognize and link to standalone PEP references (like "PEP 258").

pepFileUrlTemplate.desc: Template for PEP file part of URL. (default "pep-%04d")

rfcReferences.desc: Recognize and link to standalone RFC references (like "RFC 822").

tabWidth.desc: Set number of spaces for tab expansion (default 8).

noFileInsertion.desc: Disable directives that insert the contents of external file ("include" & "raw"); replaced with a "warning" system message.

fileInsertionEnabled.desc: Enable directives that insert the contents of external file ("include" & "raw").  Enabled by default.

noRaw.desc: Disable the "raw" directives; replaced with a "warning" system message.

rawEnabled.desc: Enable the "raw" directive.  Enabled by default.

syntaxHighlight.desc: Token name set for parsing code with Pygments: one of "long", "short", or "none (no parsing)". Default is "long".

smartQuotes.desc: Change straight quotation marks to typographic form: one of "yes", "no", "alt[ernative]" (default "no").

smartquotesLocales.desc: Characters to use as "smart quotes" for <language>.

wordLevelInlineMarkup.desc: Inline markup recognized at word boundaries only (adjacent to punctuation or whitespace). Force character-level inline markup recognition with "\ " (backslash + space). Default.

characterLevelInlineMarkup.desc: Inline markup recognized anywhere, regardless of surrounding characters. Backslash-escapes must be used to avoid unwanted markup recognition. Useful for East Asian languages. Experimental.

newlines.desc: Generate XML with newlines before and after tags.

indents.desc: Generate XML with indents and newlines.

noXmlDeclaration.desc: Omit the XML declaration.  Use with caution.

noDocTitle.desc: Disable the promotion of a lone top-level section title to document title (and subsequent section title to document subtitle promotion; enabled by default).

noDocInfo.desc: Disable the bibliographic field list transform (enabled by default).

sectionSubtitles.desc: Activate the promotion of lone subsection titles to section subtitles (disabled by default).

noSectionSubtitles.desc: Deactivate the promotion of lone subsection titles.
